tags.name: Display Preference Name
tags.desc: Displays the Pref value stored in prefname.

tags.name: Display Preference Name
tags.desc: Displays the Pref value stored in prefname. If the prefname is not found, the default value is displayed.

tags.name: Display Preference Name
tags.desc: Displays the Pref value stored in prefname.

tags.name: Pref Name Alternate Syntax
tags.desc: Alternate method to display the Pref value stored in prefname.

tags.name: School Pref ID
tags.desc: Pref value stored in {prefname} where schoolid = ~(curschoolid).

tags.name: Year School Pref
tags.desc: Get Prefs value where Name = pref_name, schoolID = curschoolID and YearID = curyeardID.

tags.name: Year Pref
tags.desc: Get Prefs value where Name = pref_name and YearID = curyeardID.

tags.name: Year School Pref
tags.desc: Get Prefs value where Name = pref_name, schoolID = curschoolID and YearID = curyeardID.

tags.name: User Year Pref
tags.desc: Get Prefs value where Name = pref_name and UserID = curUserID.
